name: Amphibit's Stick Potion
desc: A random enemy at the start of the battle suffers a 25% miss chance on all its actions.

name: Amphibit's Stick Potion
desc: A random enemy at the start of the battle suffers a 42.5% miss chance on all its actions.

name: Amphibit's Stick Potion
desc: A random enemy at the start of the battle suffers a 60% miss chance on all its actions.

name: Arsonist's Dream
desc: When an ally uses a regular attack on a burning enemy, he propagates the burning damage to another random enemy.

name: Banner of Bravery
desc: The last Unaxx alive on your team has its damage and health doubled, and is then healed to 75%.

name: Beads of Cruelty
desc: As long as they may freely choose their targets, your Unaxxes will always target the enemy with lowest HP.

name: Blamster's Potion
desc: When enemies crit naturally, 40% to miss instead.

name: Blamster's Potion
desc: When enemies crit naturally, 70% to miss instead.

name: Blamster's Potion
desc: When enemies crit naturally, 100% to miss instead.

name: Bloodsplint's Totem
desc: A random Slayer in your team gains +9 damage and +5 penetration for the battle.

name: Bone Amulet
desc: +6 defense on skeletons

name: Bottled Thunder
desc: Your lightning Elementalist’s ability now target the whole enemy team spreading 250% of the damage equally between remaining targets.

name: Burnt Boxing Glove
desc: Critical hits inflicted by Unaxxes in your team ignore defense.

name: Call of The Grave
desc: The first two enemies to die in a fight are immediately raised as skeletons on your side. You need to have a Necromancer alive in your team for the effect to work.

name: Carrotae's Focus
desc: If you have a Slayer in your team at the start of the battle, your Unaxxes gain +3 damage for each 10 max health they are missing.

name: Conduit
desc: A random Elementalist in your team gain +1 damage per ally Unaxxes of the same elements. This item triggers twice, and both iterations can effect the same Elementalist.

name: Corpse Shield
desc: Your skeletons have +25hp and +1def, and are always targeted first if possible.

name: Crashing Wave
desc: When your water Elementalists use their ability, they stun an additional random enemy.

name: Cursed Offering
desc: When one of your necromancers kills an enemy, it immediately summons a skeleton.

name: Dark Seeka's Horn
desc: 10% of your fastest Unaxx's effective speed is added to its damage.

name: Druid's Sigil
desc: When a Mender would crit, they now summon a healing spirit. This spirit loses 15hp at the end of its turn and heals a single random ally for its damage.

name: Egge's Aura
desc: One random defender on your team is always targeted first, until it dies.

name: Essence of Life
desc: Increases the health points of Unaxxes in your team by 6 for the battle.

name: Essence of Life
desc: Increases the health points of Unaxxes in your team by 10.5 for the battle.

name: Essence of Life
desc: Increases the health points of Unaxxes in your team by 15 for the battle.

name: Essence of Rage
desc: Increases the damage of Unaxxes in your team by 1.2 for the battle.

name: Essence of Rage
desc: Increases the damage of the Unaxxes in your team by 2.1 for the battle.

name: Essence of Rage
desc: Increases the damage of Unaxxes in your team by 3 for the battle.

name: Flyn's Hunger
desc: Increases the Penetration of Unaxxes in your team by 2 for the battle.

name: Flyn's Hunger
desc: Increases the Penetration of Unaxxes in your team by 3.5 for the battle. Penetration allows the attacking Unaxx to ignore the same amount of defense.

name: Flyn's Hunger
desc: Increases the Penetration of Unaxxes in your team by 5 for the battle. Penetration allows the attacking Unaxx to ignore the same amount of defense.

name: Force Binding
desc: When a Defender on your team uses a regular attack, they reduce the target's damage by 5 for the next action.

name: Fractured Mirror
desc: When your Menders use an attack, they heal a random ally by the amount of damage dealt. This heal can't trigger overheal.

name: Griffar's Intel
desc: A random defender in your team gains +50 health points and +4 defense for the battle.

name: Healing Font
desc: When one of your Menders end their turn, they heal a random ally for their 130% of the mender's damage. This ability lasts for the first 5 rounds of combat.

name: Hemolytic Poison
desc: An enemy hit by one of your Slayers has 75% chance to not be able to receive healing anymore.

name: Hope Restored
desc: The first Unaxx on your team to fall below 50% hp triggers an immediate heal from a random mender.

name: Ice-breaker
desc: When your Unaxxes target a stunned enemy, they deal +7 damage.

name: Inferno Ring
desc: As long as you have a fire Elementalist in your team at the start of the battle, when an ally uses an attack, a critical attack or an ability against a burning enemy, they inflict an additional +10 pure damage.

name: Krabbu's Shell
desc: Increases the defense of Unaxxes in your team by 0.6 for the battle.

name: Krabbu's Shell
desc: Increases the defense of Unaxxes in your team by 1.4 for the battle.

name: Krabbu's Shell
desc: Increases the defense of Unaxxes in your team by 2 for the battle.

name: Last Sacrifice
desc: When the first Mender on your team dies, it heals the entire team for 120% of its initial health, starting with the lowest health ally. If the last ally healed is sent in overheal, said buff is doubled on that ally.

name: Leper Ring
desc: A random Mender on your team can’t be targeted as long as there are other living team members.

name: Light Crown
desc: When one of your Slayer attacks with a normal attack, they have a 50% chance to stun the target.

name: Limit-break Potion
desc: If you have a Mender in your team at the start of the battle, the overheal buff has its effects increased by 25%.

name: Lost Altar
desc: If you have a Mender in your team at the start of the battle, any healing done in your team has its value increased by 50%.

name: Luck-leaf
desc: 33% of your Unaxxes natural misses are converted into crits.

name: Luck-leaf
desc: 66% of your Unaxxes natural misses are converted into crits.

name: Luck-leaf
desc: 100% of your Unaxxes natural misses are converted into crits.

name: Magmoai's Lava Shield
desc: A random defender on your team deals 10 pure damage to every attacker that damages it.

name: Maskeet Talisman
desc: Every time one of your Unaxx triggers a normal attack, they heal for 4hp.

name: Maskeet Talisman
desc: Every time one of your Unaxx triggers a normal attack, they heal for 7hp.

name: Maskeet Talisman
desc: Every time one of your Unaxx triggers a normal attack, they heal for 10hp.

name: Neuro Link
desc: When a defender on your team uses his ability, he increases the defense of two random allies by +1 for 2 turns.

name: Omni
desc: Whenever Elementalists in your team would miss, they have an 80% chance to trigger their ability instead

name: Overcharge
desc: When one of your Elementalists uses his ability, he gives shield to itself and a random ally. Shield prevents all damage done until the recipient's next turn.

name: Phoenix Tears
desc: Effect: Revives your first Unaxx to die in battle. Unaxx comes back to life with 100% hp, and cleansed of any buffs or debuffs. Only triggers once per battle.

name: Portable Seal
desc: Unaxxes in your team are immune to damage during the first round of combat.

name: Power-charger
desc: The slowest Unaxx in your team will always trigger a critical hit if it’s allowed to.

name: Rhaeder Formula
desc: Increase the critical damage of Unaxxes in your team by 15% for the battle.

name: Rhaeder Formula
desc: Increase the critical damage of Unaxxes in your team by 25% for the battle.

name: Rhaeder Formula
desc: Increase the critical damage of Unaxxes in your team by 35% for the battle.

name: Seed Cloud
desc: As long as you have a Mender in your team at the start of the battle, your Unaxxes are immune to burning and stun effects.

name: Service Beyond Death
desc: If you have a Necromancer in your team at the start of the battle, the first two allies to fall in the battle are immediately raised as skeletons.

name: Skullring
desc: Your skeletons have +6 damage for the fight.

name: Soulshear
desc: Whenever a slayer on your team attacks, crits or uses an ability, it deals 8% of the max hp of its target as additional damage.

name: Storm Shield
desc: As long as you have a Electric Elementalist at the start of the battle, your team deal 3 pure damage to any attackers that damage them.

name: Synergy Band
desc: When a slayer on your team attacks, he increases the damage of a random ally by 7 for its next action.

name: Unborn's Halo
desc: Enemies have 15% of missing whenever they use an attack, a skill or a critical strike.

name: Undead Commander
desc: When an ally critically hits, all your skeletons immediately attack the same target.

name: Unstable Regeant
desc: When one of your skeletons die, they explode inflicting their damage as pure damage to every enemy.

name: Uxxium Bracers
desc: Your Unaxxes no longer suffer from elemental disadvantage when attacked.

name: Uxxium Coating
desc: The skeletons summoned by your necromancers ignore the defense of their enemies.
